property.name: libdefaults_dns_lookup_realm
property.description: If true, DNS TXT records will be used to determine the Kerberos realm of a host.

property.name: libdefaults_dns_lookup_kdc
property.description: If true, DNS SRV records will be used to locate the KDCs and other servers for the realm.

property.name: libdefaults_renew_lifetime
property.description: Default renewable lifetime for initial tickets.

property.name: libdefaults_forwardable
property.description: If true, initial tickets will be forwardable.

property.name: libdefaults_default_tgs_enctypes
property.description: The supported list of session key encryption types that should be returned by the KDC.
property.value: aes256-cts-hmac-sha1-96 aes128-cts-hmac-sha1-96 des3-cbc-sha1 arcfour-hmac-md5 camellia256-cts-cmac camellia128-cts-cmac des-cbc-crc des-cbc-md5 des-cbc-md4

property.name: libdefaults_default_tkt_enctypes
property.description: The supported list of session key encryption types that should be requested by the client.
property.value: aes256-cts-hmac-sha1-96 aes128-cts-hmac-sha1-96 des3-cbc-sha1 arcfour-hmac-md5 camellia256-cts-cmac camellia128-cts-cmac des-cbc-crc des-cbc-md5 des-cbc-md4

property.name: realm
property.description: The realm to use when creating Service and Ambari principals from the realms section of your /etc/krb5.conf (e.g. EXAMPLE.COM).

property.name: domains
property.description: A comma-seperated list of domain names used to map server hostnames to the Realm name (e.g. .example.com,example.com). This is optional

property.name: kdc_type
property.description: The type of KDC being used. Either mit-kdc or active-directory

property.name: kdc_host
property.description: The IP address or FQDN for the KDC host. Optionally a port number may be included.

property.name: admin_server_host
property.description: The IP address or FQDN for the KDC Kerberos administrative host. Optionally a port number may be included.

property.name: content
